thread.title: Romelu Lukaku would only consider Man Utd move if this happens: Why Chelsea are favourites
thread.title_full: Romelu Lukaku would only consider Man Utd move if this happens: Why Chelsea are favourites

title: Romelu Lukaku would only consider Man Utd move if this happens: Why Chelsea are favourites
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Romelu Lukaku would only consider Man Utd move if this happens: Why Chelsea are favourites ROMELU LUKAKU would only consider a summer move to Manchester United if they qualify for the Champions League - making Chelsea favourites for his signature. PUBLISHED: 14:40, Wed, Mar 29, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:51, Wed, Mar 29, 2017 GETTY Romelu Lukaku wants to leave Everton for Champions League football 
Lukaku has rejected a new contract at Goodison Park and says he wants to leave Everton to win trophies. 
He has been linked with a return to Stamford Bridge while Manchester United are monitoring his situation. 
His agent Mino Raiola appeared to meet Ed Woodward just a week after Lukaku had rejected the new Toffees deal. GETTY Romelu Luakaku is the Premier League top scorer with 21 goals this season GETTY Romelu Lukaku is keen to get his hands on some silverware 
But Raiola also works with United stars Zlatan Ibrahimovic, Paul Pogba and Henrikh Mkhitaryan. 
However Express Sport understands United are keen on Lukaku and they will ramp up their interest if Ibrahimovic decides to leave Manchester after one season. 
But the Belgium star wants to be playing in the Champions League next season meaning United must finish in the top four or win the Europa League. Romelu Lukaku transfer odds: Where next for the Everton star? Tue, March 14, 2017
